forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early tapering to showers and becoming mixed with snow late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Some snow showers mixing in late. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. Then remaining overcast in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning. Remaining cloudy in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.
